home.title: Legacy AI
home.subtitle: Platform
home.description: Transform how you capture, preserve, and interact with memories using cutting-edge AI technology. Experience the future of digital legacy preservation.
home.featuresDescription: Explore our comprehensive suite of AI-powered tools designed to enhance your digital experience and preserve your legacy.
home.aiInterviewDescription: Real-time transcription with GPT-4 powered Q&A generation. Get instant answer suggestions during interviews with voice capture and screen sharing.
home.memoryGraphDescription: Semantic memory relationships and visualization. Connect people, memories, events, and media in an interactive graph that shows how everything relates.
home.voiceCloningDescription: Clone voices from audio samples and play back memories with familiar voices. Perfect for preserving family stories and creating personalized audio experiences.
home.avatarServiceDescription: Generate 3D avatars from photos. Automated rigging and lip sync for animated conversations that bring memories to life.
home.multimediaDescription: Drag-and-drop media upload with auto-tagging. Link photos and videos to memory nodes with metadata enrichment.
home.whyChooseDescription: Built with cutting-edge technology and user experience in mind, designed for the future.
home.realtimeAIDescription: Get instant help during interviews with live transcription and smart suggestions powered by advanced AI.
home.privacyFirstDescription: Your data stays secure with enterprise-grade encryption and local processing options for maximum privacy.
home.multiPlatformDescription: Works seamlessly across web browsers, mobile devices, and desktop applications with responsive design.
home.joinThousands: Join thousands of users who are already transforming how they preserve and interact with their memories.

pricing.title: Pricing Plans
pricing.subtitle: Select the perfect plan for your needs

faq1.question: Can I change plans later?
faq1.answer: Yes, you can upgrade or downgrade your plan at any time. Changes will be reflected in your next billing cycle.

faq2.question: What payment methods do you accept?
faq2.answer: We accept all major credit cards, debit cards, and PayPal. All payments are processed securely.

faq3.question: Is there a free trial?
faq3.answer: Yes, all plans come with a 14-day free trial. No credit card required to start your trial.

faq4.question: Can I cancel anytime?
faq4.answer: Absolutely! You can cancel your subscription at any time. Your access will continue until the end of your billing period.

pricing.ctaDescription: Join thousands of users who are already using our platform to enhance their workflow.

billing.title: Billing Dashboard
billing.subtitle: Manage your subscription and billing information
billing.noSubscriptionDescription: You don't have an active subscription. Choose a plan to get started.
billing.alreadyOnPlan: You are already on this plan
billing.confirmChangePlan: Are you sure you want to change your plan? Proration will be handled automatically.
billing.confirmCancel: Are you sure you want to cancel your subscription? You will retain access until the end of your billing period.
billing.cancelSuccess: Subscription will cancel at period end

auth.signInToAccount: Sign in to your account to continue
auth.signUpToGetStarted: Sign up to get started with your account
auth.clickIconToAdd: Click the + icon to add a profile picture (optional)
auth.validEmail: Please enter a valid email address
auth.usernameLength: Username must be between 3 and 30 characters
auth.usernameAlphanumeric: Username can only contain letters and numbers
auth.passwordMinLength: Password must be at least 6 characters
auth.firstNameMaxLength: First name must be less than 50 characters
auth.lastNameMaxLength: Last name must be less than 50 characters
auth.onlyImageFiles: Only image files (JPEG, JPG, PNG, GIF, WebP) are allowed
auth.fileSizeTooLarge: File size too large. Maximum size is 5MB.
auth.mustAgreeToPolicies: You must agree to the policies to continue

memory.title: Memory Graph
memory.selectMemory: Select a memory to view graph…
memory.selectMemoryToRender: Select a memory from the list above to render its graph.
memory.confirmDelete: Are you sure you want to delete this memory?

interview.title: AI Interview Engine
interview.subtitle: Real-time Transcription & AI Assistance
interview.step1: Join your interview call (Zoom, Teams, or Google Meet)
interview.step2: Click "Start Interview" and share your screen with audio
interview.step3: Get real-time transcription and AI-powered answer suggestions
interview.viewPastInterviews: View and manage your past interviews
interview.screenShareError: Failed to start screen sharing. Please make sure you have granted the necessary permissions.

voiceCloning.title: Voice Cloning
voiceCloning.subtitle: Create a digital clone of your voice and generate natural speech using advanced AI technology. Perfect for content creation, accessibility, and preserving your unique voice.
voiceCloning.serviceUnavailable: The voice cloning service is currently unavailable.
voiceCloning.recordDescription: Record or upload your voice sample
voiceCloning.voiceClonedSuccess: Voice cloned successfully! Ready to generate speech in your voice.
voiceCloning.selectVoiceFirst: Please go to "All Voices" to select a voice clone, or create one first.
voiceCloning.howStep1Desc: Record at least 30 seconds of clear speech or upload an audio file. Our AI analyzes your unique vocal characteristics.
voiceCloning.howStep2Desc: Advanced neural networks create a digital fingerprint of your voice, capturing tone, pitch, and speaking patterns.
voiceCloning.howStep3Desc: Type any text and hear it spoken in your own voice with natural intonation and emotion.
voiceCloning.accentDescription: Select the accent/language for this voice clone
voiceCloning.accentDescriptionGenerate: Select the accent/language for speech generation

avatar.title: Avatar Service
avatar.subtitle: 3D Pipeline
avatar.description: Upload a photo to generate a rigged 3D model. Add audio to create lipsync animations. Build realistic avatars with AI-powered technology.
avatar.createDescription: Upload a photo to generate a rigged 3D avatar
avatar.uploadPhoto: Upload a photo to generate a rigged 3D model
avatar.chooseAvatar: Choose an avatar to add audio and generate lipsync
avatar.guideStep1: Upload a photo to create your 3D avatar
avatar.guideStep2: Select an avatar from the dropdown
avatar.guideStep3: Open details to add audio and generate lipsync
avatar.getStartedDescription: Get started by creating your first 3D avatar. Upload a photo and let AI generate a rigged model for you.
avatar.avatarCreated: Avatar created successfully! Go to My Avatars tab to view it.
avatar.createAnimationsDescription: Create avatars and add lipsync animations to see them here. Each animation will be tracked in your history.
avatar.deleteAnimation: Delete this animation? This cannot be undone.
avatar.deleteAvatarConfirm: Delete this avatar and all its animations? This cannot be undone.
avatar.modelUrlNotAvailable: Model URL not available for this animation

multimedia.title: Multimedia Management
multimedia.subtitle: Upload, Organize & Link Media
multimedia.organizeDescription: Organize your media files and create meaningful connections with memory nodes
multimedia.uploadDescriptionText: Upload images and videos with automatic metadata extraction
multimedia.browseDescription: Browse and manage your uploaded media files
multimedia.nodesDescriptionText: Create and manage memory nodes to organize your media
multimedia.linkDescriptionText: Connect your media files to memory nodes to create rich relationships
multimedia.linksDescriptionText: View and manage all connections between your media and memory nodes
multimedia.analyticsDescription: Discover patterns and insights in your media collection
